statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: There are another kind of Fibonacci numbers: F(0) = 7, F(1) = 11, F(n) = F(n-1) + F(n-2) (n>=2).

statement.title: Input
statement.content: Input consists of a sequence of lines, each containing an integer n. (n < 1,000,000).

statement.title: Output
statement.content:
Print the word "yes" if 3 divide evenly into F(n).

Print the word "no" if not.

statement.title: Sample Output
statement.content:
no
no
yes
no
no
no
